position: Operational Automation Developer (Internal Post Graduate Role Only)
name: Everflow
description: Fast-growing utility company, Everflow, is seeking an internal candidate for a Blue Prism Developer role to automate business processes, improve efficiency, and enhance productivity across all utilities, with a requirement for proven experience in Blue Prism Development, excellent communication and interpersonal skills, as well as a willingness to be flexible, results-focused, and motivated to work in a fast-paced business.
